coreAttributes.name: Nanite Vial
coreAttributes.description: A sealed vial of nanites, marked with various warning labels...
coreAttributes.applyEffects:
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(start)] to feel the corrupting effects of the nanites...

[#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_MAJOR_CORRUPTION, 25)]

useDescriptions.selfUse: #IF(npc.getTorsoType()==TORSO_TYPE_cinnysuccubus_synthetic_torso) [npc.Name] [npc.verb(connect)] the vial to [npc.her] nanite input port on [npc.her] torso, the contents quickly disappearing into [npc.her] body. #ELSE [npc.Name] cautiously [npc.verb(open)] the vial and [npc.verb(drink)] the contents. #END
useDescriptions.otherUse: #IF(npc.getTorsoType()==TORSO_TYPE_cinnysuccubus_synthetic_torso) [npc.Name] [npc.verb(connect)] the vial to [npc2.her] nanite input port on [npc2.her] torso, the contents quickly disappearing into [npc2.her] body. #ELSE [npc.Name] cautiously [npc.verb(open)] the vial and [npc.verb(hold)] it out to [npc2.name], allowing [npc2.herHim] to drink the contents. #END
